term: How does the Genet Affair end?
content:
by the time genet gets to philadelphia, he has been warned on multiple occasions to cease and desist by washington, which he refuses
by the time he arrives, washington has written france asking if he can be recalled back
if he goes back to france, heâ€™s going to get his head chopped off (since the government that appointed him had got cucked by guillotine)
he begs washington for refuge in america
washington allows him *yay* and he lives happily ever after in america

*may be extra info
